Reviews.Title: Quality HP Laptop & great price
Reviews.Author: T. Gill
Reviews.Content: Another quality HP product.  Our grandson loves this laptop & uses it everyday in his college classes.  Shipping was next day, and candy bar was on top of the package.  What's not to like?  Nothing.  Great service and superior product..  This is our 2nd HP in the family, (this review coming on mine) and I'm sure there will be more.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: This laptop was bought for my son, he liked it but thought that the video freezes and at times crashes when on youtube. he was also disappointed that it came with a 30 day microsoft office
